info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 4:04PM EDT until July 12 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SHENANDOAH...WARREN...NORTHEASTERN PAGE AND EAST CENTRAL HARDY COUNTIES... At 403 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wardensville, or 8 miles north of Woodstock, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Hail is large enough to dent and damage vehicles. Some hail damage to roofs, siding, and windows is possible. Locations impacted include... Front Royal, Strasburg, Woodstock, Linden, Chester Gap, Maurertown, Toms Brook, Fort Valley, Arco, Seven Fountains, Dilbeck, Harmony, Alonzaville, Riverton, Karo, Glen Echo, Bentonville, Fishers Hill, Browntown and Buckton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. This storm is producing widespread wind damage across northern Shenandoah County. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
